name: Toastie
description:
If Toastie doesn't stay toasted hes going to die! Keep him alive by warming up next to the fire. Chop down trees and collect the logs you need to find the trees with fireflies to chop but watch out for the Hungry Deer!

Use W, A, S, D and the mouse to control movement and look around.

Left click to chop trees or stun animal

Press E to pickup or drop axe or logs - Be warned you can only carry one item at once and you only have one trusty axe.

A game made by Squash, sam_hastings and Lee Webster
